criticalSuccess.message: Your camouflage attempt exceeds expectation. Increase the Encounter DC for your camp by 2. The first time a flat check would result in an encounter during this camping session, instead treat that result as a failure with no encounter.

success.message: Your work helps hide your camp from detection. Increase the Encounter DC for your camp by 1.

Decrease the Encounter DC for your camp by 2, and flat checks made to determine encounters result in a critical success on a roll of 19 or 20.
